thread.title: Darin F
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Darin F

author: Darin F
title: Darin F
text: Bought a pair of lovely Bvlgari sunglasses but they were out of stock and awaiting delivery from the factory. Otticanet kept me up to date on the situation and on timeframes (via at least 3 emails) and advised me as soon as my glasses were on their way. The glasses are exactly as I had ordered and were delivered from Italy to Australia in a week - and a LOT cheaper than I could buy them in Sydney. Would definitely use Otticanet again. Thanks for great service!
